---
id: login-admin-with-access-token
title: "使用 AccessToken 登录（管理后台）"
description: "使用在管理后台生成的 AccessToken 免登系统管理后台。登录成功后会设置会话 Cookie 并重定向到后台首页。"
sidebar_label: "使用 AccessToken 登录（管理后台）"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/petstore/bytedesk-api-accesstoken-rest
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"使用 AccessToken 登录（管理后台）"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/auth/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



使用在管理后台生成的 AccessToken 免登系统管理后台。登录成功后会设置会话 Cookie 并重定向到后台首页。
注意：此为网页入口，一般返回 302 跳转。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"accessToken","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","minLength":16},"description":"在管理后台 Token 管理页面生成的 AccessToken"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"302":{"description":"登录成功并跳转到管理后台","headers":{"Location":{"description":"跳转目标地址","schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"400":{"description":"请求不合法（缺少或不正确的 accessToken）"},"401":{"description":"未授权或 Token 失效"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
